Articles.Content: What did I miss?

I emit another two beams of light to stop the pieces and slow them down... to a stop

- - - Updated - - -

(Junior is in a coma and Xannari are in a coma, the Krynn are attacking the Citadel, and I have melded my mind with Xannari's for a second time.)
**Other pieces start changing color, and work their way to the halted ones in order to push them together**
increases frequency of the beams and destroys the pieces
--o-. -ou-'e k-ll--g m-

Xannari?

- - - Updated - - -

changes the use of the beams to put enough pieces together to get a clear response...
You-'- kil--ng me...

You should get a Shardblade.

- - - Updated - - -

(Enters the Multiverse, and enters Xannari's mind to help Sampa)

(Summons Shardblade)

Sampa? Where are you?

\*to Laythe\* NO!, I think it is the real Xannari this time!

\*To the voice\* To whom am I speaking to? The Krynn?

You can't trust her! Everything she says could be a deception!

(Slashes one of the objects with Shardblade, dissolving it into dust)
The pieces... Are the building blocks to my physical integrity...

I...I'm sorry...

\*falls to the "ground" feeling defeated\*

You may not be aware of this, but the Krynn are outside this realm, attacking the very place you are recovering in. Our forces are doing everything we can, but we can't seem to stop their advance...

...

Move left...
\*Does as told\*
**Another piece appears where you were, and drifts toward another one a fair distance away**

No! Don't trust her! 

(Slashes another object)

- - - Updated - - -

Shoots ball of energy at another object
**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹The pieces change color, and more spawn in their places**
Vexx! Roleplaying!

(Begins cutting more objects)

Sampa, help me!
**Upon further attempts, they appear indestructible to your weapons**
NO! \*Shoots a beam of light to freeze Laythe's arms\* I trust her. SHE is the key to ending this crisis!

She's adapting! Sampa, please!

- - - Updated - - -

Tears free using the power of quantum improbability

Adaptation is... Physiological...

Beware when they come

An army of moderators appears, wielding banhammers of infinite potency and keys to the Locked Threads. Unimpressed with the flouting of the moratorium on roleplay in the forums, they close the thread with a reminder of the powerful compulsions demanding such.
